author: zhoukevin
msg: java.util.Scanner.hasNextLine() behaves differently from RI. Given a simple test scenario as follows,
When user inputs the 1st line ends with ENTER, HARMONY will blocks on line 2 of the above code and doesn't outputs the 1st string, while RI does.
This patch fixes the above problem and adds a test case for coverage.
